name: EsDeeKid
description:
'''EsDeeKid''' is a British rapper from [[Liverpool]]. He was named one of the year's breakout stars in 2024 by ''[[Pitchfork (website)|Pitchfork]]'' following the release of the single "Bally" featuring Rico Ace. He released his debut album, ''[[Rebel (EsDeeKid album)|Rebel]]'', in June 2025.

His music is characterised by his thick [[Scouse]] accent and draws inspiration from [[cloud rap]]. EsDeeKid's identity is unknown; he covers his face with a [[Balaclava (clothing)|balaclava]] and keeps personal information, such as his age, private. He has mentioned on his [[Twitter]] that he still lives in his [[council house]].

As of November 2025, his single "[[Phantom (song)|Phantom]]" (with Rico Ace) has accumulated more than 120 million streams, and album ''Rebel'' has charted in multiple European countries, as well as peaked at number 67 on the US [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]], despite being released nearly five months prior to its debut on the chart. He has been described by ''[[Dazed]]'' as "the fastest-growing artist in the world right now".
